theme_styles.label: Theme Styles:
theme_styles.comment: This color will be used for style

b_font.label: Body Font:
b_font.comment: This font will be used for font

h_font.label: Heading Font:
h_font.comment: This font will be used for font

bg_color.label: Background Color:
bg_color.comment: This color will be used for background

text_color.label: Font Color:
text_color.comment: This color will be used for font

link_hover_color.label: Link Hover Color:
link_hover_color.comment: This hover color will be used for link

link_active_color.label: Link Active Color:
link_active_color.comment: This active color will be used for link

icons_bg_color.comment: This color will be used for icons

icons_bg_hover_color.label: Icons Background Hover:
icons_bg_hover_color.comment: This color will be used for icons hover

buttons_bg_color.label: Button Background:
buttons_bg_color.comment: This color will be used for buttons

buttons_bg_hover_color.comment: This color will be used for buttons hover

addtocart_bg_color.comment: This color will be used for button add to cart

addtocart_bg_hover_color.label: Button Add to Cart Hover:
addtocart_bg_hover_color.comment: This color will be used for button add to cart hover

header_link_color.label: Header Link Color:
header_link_color.comment: Text color of links inside Header

header_link_hover_color.label: Header Link Hover Color:
header_link_hover_color.comment: This color will be used for link hover

header_link_active_color.label: Header Link Active Color:
header_link_active_color.comment: This color will be used for link active

m_font.label: Menu Font:
m_font.comment: This font will be used for font

mainmenu_dropdown_bg_color.label: Dropdown Background Color:
mainmenu_dropdown_bg_color.comment: This color will be used for background dropdown menu

mainmenu_bg_hover_color.label: Background Hover Color:
mainmenu_bg_hover_color.comment: This color will be used for background menu

mainmenu_bg_active_color.label: Background Active Color:
mainmenu_bg_active_color.comment: This color will be used for background menu

mainmenu_text_color.label: Mainmenu Text Color:
mainmenu_text_color.comment: This color will be used for font

mainmenu_link_hover_color.label: Mainmenu Link Hover Color:
mainmenu_link_hover_color.comment: This color will be used for Link

mainmenu_link_active_color.label: Mainmenu Link Active Color:
mainmenu_link_active_color.comment: This color will be used for Link

mainmenu_link_sub_hover_color.label: Submenu Link Hover:
mainmenu_link_sub_hover_color.comment: This color will be used for submenu link hover

footer_static_link_color.label: Footer Link Color:
footer_static_link_color.comment: This color will be used for Link

footer_static_link_hover_color.label: Footer Link Hover Color:
footer_static_link_hover_color.comment: This color will be used for link hover

footer_static_link_active_color.label: Footer Link Active Color:

show_type.label: Show type (Show Category description or show static blocks with Identifier for url key category in dropdown):

nav_urlkey.label: URL Key Category Show Dropdown Menu:
nav_urlkey.comment: Which url key you want they show dropdrow (Once per line)

static_identifier.label: Static block identifiers:
static_identifier.comment: Which static block you want they show on menu (Once per line)

page_id.label: CMS Page id:
page_id.comment: Which cms page you want they show on menu (Once per line)

catalog_grid_2col.label: Number of columns in grid mode ( 2 columns layout ) :
catalog_grid_2col.comment:
To change number of products per page go to
System -> Configuration -> Catalog -> Frontend

catalog_grid_1col.label: Number of columns in grid mode ( 1 column layout ) :

product_img_width.label: Image Width:
product_img_width.comment: This parameter is used for responsive

product_img_height.label: Image Height:
product_img_height.comment: This parameter is used for responsive

catsid.label:
Categories ID:
(Category name will not be displayed in filter if it have no product in this category can be show because the Product Limit set below or match the Mode!)

maxlength.label: Short Description Max Length
maxlength.comment: Empty for display all short discription.

maxlength.label: Short Description Max Length
maxlength.comment: Empty for display all short discription.

logo_path.label: URL Path Logo:
logo_path.comment: Which URL Path Logo key you want they show scroll (Once per line)

static_mainbottom1_cols.label: Bottom Static 1 Cols:
static_mainbottom1_cols.comment: Total of this number and 3 other cols of Bottom Static must be equal 12

static_mainbottom2_cols.label: Bottom Static 2 Cols:
static_mainbottom2_cols.comment: Total of this number and 3 other cols of Bottom Static must be equal 12

static_mainbottom3_cols.label: Bottom Static 3 Cols:
static_mainbottom3_cols.comment: Total of this number and 3 other cols of Bottom Static must be equal 12

static_mainbottom4_cols.label: Static Main Bottom 4 Cols:
static_mainbottom4_cols.comment: Total of this number and 3 other cols of Static Main Bottom must be equal 12

static_footer1_cols.label: Footer Static 1 cols:
static_footer1_cols.comment: Total of this number and 3 other cols of Footer Static must be equal 12

static_footer2_cols.label: Footer Static 2 cols:
static_footer2_cols.comment: Total of this number and 3 other cols of Footer Static must be equal 12

static_product_cols.label: Products Static Cols:
static_product_cols.comment: Total of this number and 3 other cols of Static Main Bottom must be equal 12

twitter_replace.label: Replace Twitter with Static block:
twitter_replace.comment: Enter stactic block Identifier if you want to replace twitter block with your static block

facebook_replace.label: Replace Facebook with Static block
facebook_replace.comment: Enter stactic block Identifier if you want to replace facebook block with your static block
